generatedPrompts.frontCover: A charming watercolor painting of a cartoon capybara blissfully soaking in a yuzu-filled hot spring tub, wearing a tiny birthday party hat slightly askew. The capybara has a serene, smiling expression. Floating in the water around it are a few rubber duckies, also wearing miniature party hats. The steam rising from the tub subtly forms soft, puffy clouds. In the center of the image, written in a beautiful, readable, and elegant handwritten cursive script, is the text "Happy Birthday, Emma!". The entire scene is rendered in a flat 2D style with soft, flowing watercolor colors, visible artistic brushstrokes, organic paint bleeds, and a subtle paper texture background.
generatedPrompts.backCover:
Create a very minimal back cover for a greeting card. Extract ONLY the color palette and artistic style from this description BUT create a much simpler design: "A charming watercolor painting of a cartoon capybara blissfully soaking in a yuzu-filled hot spring tub, wearing a tiny birthday party hat slightly askew. The capybara has a serene, smiling expression. Floating in the water around it are a few rubber duckies, also wearing miniature party hats. The steam rising from the tub subtly forms soft, puffy clouds. In the center of the image, written in a beautiful, readable, and elegant handwritten cursive script, is the text "Happy Birthday, Emma!". The entire scene is rendered in a flat 2D style with soft, flowing watercolor colors, visible artistic brushstrokes, organic paint bleeds, and a subtle paper texture background.". 
    
Use only 20% visual density - perhaps a single small element, subtle corner detail, or soft color gradient. Most of the back should be clean, peaceful space. Think elegant minimalism. IMPORTANT: DO NOT include any people, characters, or figures. in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds - Flat 2D artwork for printing
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing - IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated for QR code placement

The steam rising from the tub subtly forms soft, puffy clouds. The entire scene is rendered in a flat 2D style with soft, flowing watercolor colors, visible artistic brushstrokes, organic paint bleeds, and a subtle paper texture background.".

- EXACT TEXT REPRODUCTION: The message text must be reproduced EXACTLY as written - every word, punctuation mark, and character must be perfect
- PUT TEXT IN QUOTES: Always enclose the message text in double quotes to make it clear this is literal text to be rendered exactly
- CRYSTAL CLEAR LEGIBILITY: The handwriting must be extremely readable - prioritize clarity over artistic flourishes
- NO SPELLING ERRORS: Every word must be spelled correctly exactly as provided
- PROPER SPACING: Use appropriate letter spacing, word spacing, and line spacing for easy reading
- CONTRAST: Ensure high contrast between text and background for maximum readability
- SIZE: Make text large enough to read easily - avoid cramped or tiny text
- COMPLETE MESSAGE: Include the ENTIRE message text - do not truncate, abbreviate, or omit any part
- Use beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal
- Position the message text in the optimal location for readability (center area, avoid top/bottom 10%) 

Think premium stationery - mostly white space, perfect message placement, and just a touch of elegant decoration (corner details, small flourish, or soft wash). The message should dominate the visual hierarchy. - Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
